item.title: [Draft] Reflected Glory
item.description: This is a follow up on Identity - or Keep Your Identity Small by Paul Graham. I’ve added the relevant excerpts below in case you have not read that already, though I highly recommend that you do. The essay is little more than 10 years old at this point. I’m disappointed because no one has written a good method on how to act on the advice which Paul shares in that piece.
